Text:
While it's encoded with very high resolution (1280 x 720) the video quality is less than impressive. I'd say it's reencoded from a low to a high resolution.

All in all I think the children will enjoy this, so thanks, but try to tweak the encoding because I think that from a DVD it's possible to do better (without it becoming bigger either).
agreed, its my first go at encoding, and it was harder than i thought it'd be...  This was the best i could (be botheredto ) do, but hopefully the kids will enjoy it!
